lead_paragraph: A family cleaning out a home in the Toledo, Ohio-area home of a relative who recently died stumbled across a live hand grenade from the World War II era.
snippet: A family cleaning out a home in the Toledo, Ohio-area home of a relative who recently died stumbled across a live hand grenade from the World War II era....

headline.main: Toledo, Ohio Police: Finds of Old Ammo Becoming More Common
headline.print_headline: Toledo, Ohio Police: Finds of Old Ammo Becoming More Common
